page.title: 15Amenities Health & Social
page.content: Being an open rural area, the amenities are restricted to a doctor group practice surgery and clinic in Rowhedge, which is open each day, while at Fingringhoe there is a doctor's surgery, but the doctor only comes to the village hall every Wednesday afternoon. There are old people's homes in both villages and a Health Visitor has responsibility for the area. The E. Donyland Community Association has been formed to provide the village with a large community centre which has been paid for through continual fund-raising by the whole village
